title: The Path Forward
goal: Kaelen, now recognized as a leader, commits to rebuilding and preparing for the true war, with Lyra and Seraphina by his side.

beats.summary: In the somber aftermath, Kaelen surveys the devastation, assessing the damage and the profound losses suffered by the Sages.
Reluctantly, but with a newfound sense of purpose, Kaelen is acknowledged as the new leader or a pivotal figure in the shattered Conclave.
He outlines a long-term strategy for rebuilding the Sages, not merely their numbers, but their purpose and their understanding of the true enemy.
Lyra, steadfast and resolute, commits to aiding Kaelen in this monumental task, becoming his trusted confidante and the bridge to the new age.
Seraphina, though still enigmatic, offers her continued, albeit pragmatic, support, recognizing the greater threat and Kaelen's unique position to face it.
The true scope of the coming conflict is understood: a protracted, mythic struggle against a deeply entrenched, ancient evil that threatens all existence.
